metadata.name: Color Blind
metadata.description:
Close your eyes.

In pixels dim and screens askew,  
A digital revolution brews.  
Colours fade and shadows loom,  
A world of darkness, a digital gloom.

Gone are the days of light and hope,  
A world of despair now helps us cope.  
A spectrum dark, a monochrome hue,  
A burst of shadows, all we can construe.

The digital age has changed the way,  
We see and interact with the world today.  
Colours now fade, and life seems grim,  
In ways we never dreamed of, trapped within.

So let us embrace the shadows and shades,  
Of this new world that humans have made.  
For in this digital age, darkness reigns,  
And our world will never be the same.
